title: Spanish Colonial-Inspired Mexico Retreat in Stylish Saltillo
description:
The stylish Quinta Real Saltillo effortlessly blends traditional Mexican style and modern luxury, offering guests a brilliant launchpad for their Northern Mexico adventures. The hotel is nestled in a picturesque valley at the foot of the Sierra Madre Oriental mountains, surrounded by stunning peaks and metropolitan buzz. Inside the hotel, guests will find spacious suites and hand-carved furnishings set among delicately painted murals and traditional Spanish Colonial autumnal colours. Dine at Las Vitrinas Restaurant, where guests can sample tantalising Mexican flavours, or sip margaritas poolside at the elegant bar.

If you manage to tear yourself away, you'll be perfectly placed to explore Saltillo. Head downtown and explore the Museo de Aves, home to over 2,000 bird species, stroll through the Bosque Urbano or take in the views from the Mirador de Saltillo.
offer_address: Boulevard José Sarmiento No. 1385 Col. Fracc. Rancho de Peña, 25210 Saltillo, Coahuila, México
